ValidationRule.description: When the Vendor Change Form is approved only Status and Detailed Description can be updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Vendor Change Request", ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Approved'), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", OR( ISCHANGED( Related_Vendor__c ), ISCHANGED( Planned_Start_Date_Time__c ), ISCHANGED( Planned_End_Date_Time__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the Status or Detailed Description may be changed when the Vendor Change Form is Approved.
